subject: Wrestling
lead_paragraph: Brock Lesnar stopped the heavyweight champion Randy Couture in the second round of their fight on Saturday night in Las Vegas. He earned a technical knockout when the referee stepped in as Lesnar kept punching after Couture went to the ground. Lesnar, a former N.C.A.A. wrestling champion and pro wrestling star, overwhelmed the 45-year-old Couture in just his fourth professional fight.
snippet: Brock Lesnar stopped the heavyweight champion Randy Couture in the second round of their fight on Saturday night in Las Vegas. He earned a technical knockout when the referee stepped in as Lesnar kept punching after Couture went to the ground....
